divs: Sighting Detailsit happened in a sort of desert beach in the amazonic region in norht brazil this past december. The object appeared in the sky leaving a trace of smole behind it and then disappeared, then, it reappeared this time dropping from the sky sort of like a meteorite except that it zig zagged s it dropped very fast again leaving a trace of smoke behind it and then splashed into the water raising a large amount of water that even scared some on the inhabitants of the samall fisherman village where it happened. A couple of years ago i , myself , alongwith other 10 to 12 eople observed a very large and long shaped cigar object at nigh in the same beach. On the ocassion we figured that the object was at least 2 to 3 kilometers long and very silent. Now, this crash incident happened right in front of us. My personal opinion is that it is still there and it was not like a large metheorite. if you wish you can contact me on the phones i provided above. thank you
